languages.text: "Тебе не понять хитросплетений Комморры и ее строя, {name}. Мы все — союзники и худшие враги друг другу, надежная опора и готовое свершиться предательство. Культы всегда стояли на полступеньки ниже кабалов, и ведьмам только в радость измываться над тем, кто раньше возвышался над ними".

traits.locale_text: "Тебе не понять хитросплетений Комморры и ее строя, {name}. Мы все — союзники и худшие враги друг другу, надежная опора и готовое свершиться предательство. Ведьминские культы всегда стояли на полступеньки ниже кабалов, и ведьмам только в радость измываться над тем, кто раньше возвышался над ними".
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "You cannot hope to understand the intricacies of Commorragh and how it is structured, {name}. We are all each other's allies and worst enemies here, towers of strength and duplicitous traitors both. The Cults have always been half a step below the Kabals in the hierarchy, and the Wyches relished the chance to abuse someone who once looked down on them."
languages.original_text: "Тебе не понять хитросплетений Комморры и ее строя, {name}. Мы все — союзники и худшие враги друг другу, надежная опора и готовое свершиться предательство. Культы всегда стояли на полступеньки ниже кабалов, и ведьмам только в радость измываться над тем, кто раньше возвышался над ними".

We are all each other's allies and worst enemies here, towers of strength and duplicitous traitors both. The Cults have always been half a step below the Kabals in the hierarchy, and the Wyches relished the chance to abuse someone who once looked down on them."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: «No intentes entender las complejidades de Commorragh y su estructura, {name}. Todos somos nuestros mayores aliados y peores enemigos a la vez aquí, sirviendo como pilares de fuerza y como traidores engañosos al mismo tiempo. Los Cultos siempre han estado medio paso por debajo de las Kábalas en la jerarquía, y las Brujas han disfrutado de la oportunidad de abusar de alguien que antes las despreciaba».
languages.original_text: "You cannot hope to understand the intricacies of Commorragh and how it is structured, {name}. We are all each other's allies and worst enemies here, towers of strength and duplicitous traitors both. The Cults have always been half a step below the Kabals in the hierarchy, and the Wyches relished the chance to abuse someone who once looked down on them."

traits.locale_text: «No intentes entender las complejidades de Commorragh y su estructura, {name}. Todos somos nuestros mayores aliados y peores enemigos a la vez aquí, sirviendo como pilares de fuerza y como traidores engañosos al mismo tiempo. Los Cultos siempre han estado medio paso por debajo de las Kábalas en la jerarquía, y las Brujas han disfrutado de la oportunidad de abusar de alguien que antes las despreciaba».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: “恐怕你理解不了科摩罗有多么复杂，也无法理解它的规则，{name}。在那里，我们既可以是彼此的盟友，也可以是剑拔弩张的敌人。既可以是强力的支柱，也可以是两面三刀的叛徒。在科摩罗的等级制度中，巫灵教派不像阴谋团那样地位尊崇，而那些巫灵也很乐意折磨那些曾经看不起他们的人。”
languages.original_text: "You cannot hope to understand the intricacies of Commorragh and how it is structured, {name}. We are all each other's allies and worst enemies here, towers of strength and duplicitous traitors both. The Cults have always been half a step below the Kabals in the hierarchy, and the Wyches relished the chance to abuse someone who once looked down on them."

traits.locale_text: “恐怕你理解不了科摩罗有多么复杂，也无法理解它的规则，{name}。在那里，我们既可以是彼此的盟友，也可以是剑拔弩张的敌人。既可以是强力的支柱，也可以是两面三刀的叛徒。在科摩罗的等级制度中，巫灵教派不像阴谋团那样地位尊崇，而那些巫灵也很乐意折磨那些曾经看不起他们的人。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: 「コモラフの事情や構造を理解するのはほぼ不可能だぜ、{name}。俺たちは皆ここでは互いの味方であり最悪の敵であり、力の塔であり、二枚舌の裏切り者なのさ。教団は常に階層において陰謀団より半歩下に位置していて、ウィッチたちはかつて自分たちを見下していた者をいたぶる機会を楽しんでいた」
languages.original_text: "You cannot hope to understand the intricacies of Commorragh and how it is structured, {name}. We are all each other's allies and worst enemies here, towers of strength and duplicitous traitors both. The Cults have always been half a step below the Kabals in the hierarchy, and the Wyches relished the chance to abuse someone who once looked down on them."

traits.locale_text: 「コモラフの事情や構造を理解するのはほぼ不可能だぜ、{name}。俺たちは皆ここでは互いの味方であり最悪の敵であり、力の塔であり、二枚舌の裏切り者なのさ。教団は常に階層において陰謀団より半歩下に位置していて、ウィッチたちはかつて自分たちを見下していた者をいたぶる機会を楽しんでいた」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: « Vous ne pouvez pas comprendre les subtilités de Commorragh et de sa hiérarchie, {name}. Nous sommes tous tout à la fois alliés et ennemis jurés, parangons de loyauté et traîtres infidèles. Depuis toujours, les cultes sont relégués un échelon en dessous des Kabales, et les Cérastes ont sauté sur l'occasion de malmener un de leurs supérieurs tombé en disgrâce. »
languages.original_text: "You cannot hope to understand the intricacies of Commorragh and how it is structured, {name}. We are all each other's allies and worst enemies here, towers of strength and duplicitous traitors both. The Cults have always been half a step below the Kabals in the hierarchy, and the Wyches relished the chance to abuse someone who once looked down on them."

traits.locale_text: « Vous ne pouvez pas comprendre les subtilités de Commorragh et de sa hiérarchie, {name}. Nous sommes tous tout à la fois alliés et ennemis jurés, parangons de loyauté et traîtres infidèles. Depuis toujours, les cultes sont relégués un échelon en dessous des Kabales, et les Cérastes ont sauté sur l'occasion de malmener un de leurs supérieurs tombé en disgrâce. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Ihr werdet die Feinheiten Commorraghs und seines Aufbaus niemals verstehen können, {name}. Wir sind hier alle miteinander verbündet und gleichzeitig schlimmste Feinde, Türme der Stärke und heuchlerische Verräter. Die Kulte standen in der Hierarchie schon immer einen halben Schritt unter den Kabalen, und die Hekatari waren froh über die Gelegenheit, jemanden zu misshandeln, der einst auf sie hinabgeblickt hatte."
languages.original_text: "You cannot hope to understand the intricacies of Commorragh and how it is structured, {name}. We are all each other's allies and worst enemies here, towers of strength and duplicitous traitors both. The Cults have always been half a step below the Kabals in the hierarchy, and the Wyches relished the chance to abuse someone who once looked down on them."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr werdet die Feinheiten Commorraghs und seines Aufbaus niemals verstehen können, {name}. Wir sind hier alle miteinander verbündet und gleichzeitig schlimmste Feinde, Türme der Stärke und heuchlerische Verräter. Die Kulte standen in der Hierarchie schon immer einen halben Schritt unter den Kabalen, und die Hekatari waren froh über die Gelegenheit, jemanden zu misshandeln, der einst auf sie hinabgeblickt hatte."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.original_text: "You cannot hope to understand the intricacies of Commorragh and how it is structured, . We are all each other's allies and worst enemies here, towers of strength and duplicitous traitors both. The Cults have always been half a step below the Kabals in the hierarchy, and the Wyches relished the chance to abuse someone who once looked down on them."

languages.text: "Sen Commorragh ilişkilerinin karmaşıklığını, nelere dayandığını idrak edemezsin {name}. Burada herkes birbirinin hem can dostu hem de can düşmanı, hem dayanağı hem de sırtından bıçaklayanı. Tarikatların hiyerarşideki konumu, Kabalların hep bir seviye altına olmuştur. Viçler de zamanında onları küçük görmüş birine eziyet etme fırsatını bulmuşken kaçıracak değil."
languages.original_text: "You cannot hope to understand the intricacies of Commorragh and how it is structured, {name}. We are all each other's allies and worst enemies here, towers of strength and duplicitous traitors both. The Cults have always been half a step below the Kabals in the hierarchy, and the Wyches relished the chance to abuse someone who once looked down on them."

traits.locale_text: "Sen Commorragh ilişkilerinin karmaşıklığını, nelere dayandığını idrak edemezsin {name}. Burada herkes birbirinin hem can dostu hem de can düşmanı. Hem dayanağı hem de sırtından bıçaklayanı. Tarikatların hiyerarşideki konumu, Kabalların hep bir seviye altına olmuştur. Viçler de zamanında onları küçük görmüş birine eziyet etme fırsatını bulmuşken kaçıracak değil."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
